plot: Two high school graduates take a disastrous road trip to Arizona to present a statue only to have it damaged over and over in the process.
title: Take It Easy
plot_es: Two high school graduates take a disastrous road trip to Arizona to present a statue only to have it damaged over and over in the process.
plot_en: Two high school graduates take a disastrous road trip to Arizona to present a statue only to have it damaged over and over in the process.
